data.comment: Today's referee, Cesar Arturo Ramos, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 6, Free kick Monterrey.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 9, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Monterrey needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Monterrey throw-in in Juarez's half.
In the minute 14, Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in Juarez territory.
Dorlan Pabon (Monterrey) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Monterrey's Dorlan Pabon breaks free at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Monterrey are pushing forward but Rogelio Funes Mori's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Nicolas Sanchez of Monterrey smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 19, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Monterrey.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Juarez.
Gustavo Velazquez is booked for the away team.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 24, Juarez have a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal! Juarez have got their heads in front thanks to a Dario Lezcano strike.
In the minute 27, Great play from Flavio Santos to set up the goal.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori gets in a shot on goal at Estadio BBVA Bancomer. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
Can Juarez capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Juarez's Maximiliano Olivera is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Throw-in for Monterrey in the half of Juarez.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 42, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
At Estadio BBVA Bancomer the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Juarez a goal kick.
Dario Lezcano has recovered and rejoins the match in Monterrey.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The match at Estadio BBVA Bancomer has been interrupted briefly for a check on Dario Lezcano, who is down injured.
The second-half has started.
Can Juarez get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
In the minute 47, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monterrey's half?
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 50, Goal! Ake Arnaud Loba (Monterrey) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Monterrey.
Rogelio Funes Mori with an assist there.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 52, Juarez to take a throw-in in Monterrey territory.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marco Fabian for Juarez gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Monterrey have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Throw-in Juarez.
In the minute 56, Juarez are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Juarez have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 58, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ake Arnaud Loba (Monterrey) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 59, Monterrey move into a 2-1 lead through a Ake Arnaud Loba header.
Rogelio Funes Mori instrumental with a fine assist.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Juarez.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's second substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Matias Kranevitter replacing Celso Ortiz.
The home team have replaced Jesus Gallardo with Miguel Layun. This is the first substitution made today by Antonio Mohamed.
In the minute 63, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Juarez a goal kick.
In Monterrey Monterrey attack through Rogelio Funes Mori. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Monterrey.
In the minute 64, Blas Armoa is replacing Eryc Castillo for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 66, Antonio Mohamed (Monterrey) is making a third substitution, with Maximiliano Meza replacing Dorlan Pabon.
In Monterrey Juarez attack through Marco Fabian. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
In the minute 69, Juarez's Dario Lezcano gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Monterrey defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Monterrey in Monterrey.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for Monterrey, close to Juarez's area.
In the minute 75, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Monterrey.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a second substitution, with Francisco Contreras replacing Jesus Zavala.
Gabriel Caballero is making the team's third substitution at Estadio BBVA Bancomer with Victor Omar Manon replacing Flavio Santos.
In the minute 79, Free kick Juarez.
Jonathan Gonzalez is on a sub for Ake Arnaud Loba for Monterrey.
Sebastian Vegas (Monterrey) gets a yellow card.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monterrey.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Francisco Contreras gets his shot on target but fails to score for Juarez.
In the minute 82, Juarez advance rapidly upfield but Cesar Arturo Ramos blows for offside.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 84, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Brian Rubio is replacing Alberto Acosta for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Juarez drives forward and Marco Fabian gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Monterrey to check on Hugo Gonzalez, who is grimacing with pain.
Monterrey's Hugo Gonzalez looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 88, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Monterrey throw-in in Juarez's half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of Juarez.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio BBVA Bancomer.
Throw-in for Monterrey close to the penalty box.
In Monterrey a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Juarez.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
